overview:
Morten is a web designer and developer, WordPress developer and hacker, Microsoft Expression Web MVP, open source evangelist, educator, author and web consultant.

He splits his time between designing and developing complex WordPress-based websites, taking photos and playing music. An HTML, CSS and WordPress expert he teaches and writes educational articles on web design and helps people and companies solve web related problems. He has published two books on Microsoft Expression Web, has written for Computer Arts and is a regular contributor to the Microsoft Expression Newsletter. He also publishes articles on web design, WordPress customization and Expression Web on his popular design and development blog Design is Philosophy. He also does live presentations and demos on WordPress and Expression Web and has presented at WordCamp Whistler, Make Web Not War and several other live and online events.

For his work with Expression Web he has been awarded with two consecutive Microsoft MVP Awards.
